PJSC MegaFon / GM Statement PJSC MegaFon: Resolutions taken by the EGM
22-Aug-2016 / 09:55 CET /CEST Dissemination of a Regulatory Announcement, transmitted by EquityStory. RS, LLC - a company of EQS Group AG. The issuer is solely responsible for the content of this announcement.
Resolutions taken by the EGM Moscow , Russian Federation ( 22 August 2016 ) - Public Joint Stock Company ' MegaFon' (LSE: MFON), a leading Russian telecommunications operator, ('MegaFon' or the 'Company') announces that MegaFon's Extraordinary General Shareholders' Meeting (EGM) held on 19 August 2016 in the form of a face-to-face meeting took the following resolutions: 1. To early terminate the powers of the Board of Directors of the Company elected at the Annual General Shareholders' Meeting of the Company on June 30, 2016 2. To elect the Board of Directors of the Company in the following composition: 1. Lord Paul Myners ; 2. Jan Erik Rudberg ; 3. Ivan Vladimirovich Tavrin. 4. Vladimir Yakovlevich Streshinsky ; 4. Nikolay Borisovich Krylov ; 5. Carl Peter Christian Luiga ; 7. Ingrid Maria Stenmark ; - end - For More Information: PJSC MegaFon
Media: Yulia Dorokhina Tel: + 7 926 200 6854 ydorokhina@Megafon.ru Investors: Dmitry Kononov Tel: + 7 926 200 6490 dkononov@megafon.ru Notes to Editors MegaFon PJSC is a leading Russian integrated telecommunication service provider, operating in all segments of the telecommunications markets in Russia , and in the Republics of Abkhazia , South Ossetia and Tajikistan . MegaFon is a recognized market leader in the provision of mobile data services, was the first operator in Russia to launch commercial operation of a third generation (3G) network and was the first operator in the world to launch commercial operation of an LTE Advanced (4G) data network. MegaFon is traded on the Moscow Stock Exchange and the London Stock Exchange under the symbol MFON. Additional information about MegaFon and the products and services provided by MegaFon can be found at http://www.megafon.ru Cautionary Statement Regarding Forward Looking Statements Some of the information in this document may contain or refer to projections or other forward-looking statements regarding future events or the future financial performance of the Company.
